title: LevelBlue Completes Acquisition of Aons Cybersecurity and IP Litigation Consulting Groups
summary: DALLAS & DUBLIN--(BUSINESS WIRE)--LevelBlue, a global leader in cloud-based, AI-driven managed security services, today announced the completion of its acquisition of Aons (NYSE: AON) Cybersecurity and Intellectual Property (IP) Litigation consulting groups, including the renowned cybersecurity firm, Stroz Friedberg, and Elysium Digital.
